name: AMLDonkey
description: Multi-Network p2p file sharing MLDonkey installer. Supports overnet, kadmelia, donkey, bittorrent and direct networks. It is compatible with eMule and eDonkey network. Get more info at http://mldonkey.sourceforge.net/Main_Page  MLDonkey can be managed from remote PC accessing to its web Interface via http://RUNNING_IP:4080/ To do that add allowed_ips under options->Settings->Ports using your Android device.
